title: Bossa N' Marley - Various Artists (Bob Marley covers)
description:
Bossa N' Marley - Various Artists (2005)
Mp3 160 kbit/s
Genre: Electronic
Style: Downtempo  
After the Monumental Success of Bossa N' Stones (An Album that Has Revolutionized the Electronic Music Market) Comes the Next Bossa Flavour, this Time with the Repertoire of the Late Great Bob Marley. The Combination of Lyrics Written by One of the Most Passionate and Pacifist Songwriters of Our Time Along with the Elegant Arrangements of Bossa Nova and the Futuristic Spirit of Electronic Music Are a Natural Mix. Bossa N' Marley Includes Hymns for Universal Brotherhood and Songs of Revolt that Take on New Significance with a Sound that Fits Snuggly Between the Tradition of Bossa Nova and the Innovation of Chill Out. Like Its Predecessor, Bossa N' Marley is an Album that Delineates an Exciting Trend in Music. MBB. 2005.

11_Could You Be Loved - Banda Do Sul Feat. Sawa
12_Waiting in Vain - Ituana

NOTE: This is not my music style! I found it in my search for Bob Marley recording's and dl it of curiosity.It's not so bad, so i decide to upload it to the people how like it! And if you ar a BIG Bob Marley fan,so is this "a must have" : D
